articles.author: Julian E. Barnes, Jeffrey Gettleman
articles.title: Russia-Ukraine War News: Live Updates - The New York Times
articles.description: American intelligence agencies said they believe Russia will step up strikes in the coming days on Ukraine’s civilian infrastructure and government buildings.
articles.content: Demonstrators in Kyiv, Ukraine, held signs last month, accusing Russia of terrorism a day after an explosion at a prison camp in Olenivka killed dozens of Ukrainian prisoners.Credit...Laura Boushnak … [+3547 chars]

articles.title: Calm Down, Rema's Big Hit Receives A Global Makeover - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: Rema has enlisted the help of American pop star Selena Gomez for the remix of his Calm Down song in an effort to achieve international
articles.content: Rema’s song “Calm Down” shot to a hundred million views on YouTube in less than three months after it was released, making it an immediate hit. The track, made available as one of the songs before hi… [+670 chars]
